response.overview: On December 31st GCW presents Aftermath 2023 live on TrillerTV+ straight from Showboat Hotel Atlantic City. The event features the GCW World Title Match where Blake Christian defends the title against ??? opponent.  Also in the lineup  GCW Tag Team Title Match Violence is Forever (Dominic Garrini & Kevin Ku) (c) vs Wasted Youth (Dyln McKay & Marcus Mathers)  Do or Die Rumble Match Gringo Loco vs Mike Bailey vs Everett Connors vs Effy vs Cole Radrick vs Broski Jimmy vs Allie Katch vs Steph De Lander vs Jordan Oliver vs Joshua Bishop vs Masha Slamovich vs Griffin McCoy vs Jordan Cruz vs Sawyer Wreck vs Mr. Danger vs ???  Risa Sera vs Charli Evans  Death Match Jun Kasai vs Nick Gage  *lineup subject to change
response.title: GCW: Aftermath 2023
